modName: Modular Weightless Items - Work In Progress
summary: Alters the weight of all Alchemy Ingredients, Soul Gems, Crafting Materials and Potions to 0. The mod is completely modular so you don't have to use all of them. More items will be added in the future, like books and spell tomes.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#548dd4][font=Impact][SIZE=7]Modular Weightless Items[/SIZE][/font][/color]

[line]
[i]Description[/i]
[line]

[b]This mod is a work in progress. More features will be added in the future. Leave suggestions in the posts.[/b]

Alters the weight of all Alchemy Ingredients, Soul Gems, Crafting Materials and Potions to 0. The mod is completely modular so you don't have to use all of them. More items will be added in the future, like books and spell tomes.

Modular means that you are able to check what parts of the mod you want to install, for example:
You want alchemy and books to weight nothing, but you think it is overpowered to have crafting materials weight nothing, well with this mod that is possible!

Mods used in screenshots:
- SkyUI
- 2K Textures
- ENBSeries

[line]
[i]Installation[/i]
[line]

Install using the Nexus Mod Manager and use the Installation Menu to select what modules you want.

[i]Notes: Keep near the bottom of your load order. Incompatible with mods that alter weight.[/i]

[line]
[i]Suggestions[/i]
[line]

If you have a suggestion for this mod, or have any items that I have forgotten to add, please post them so I can fix the problem.

[line][/center]
author: Oplosthee

files.name: ModularWeightlessItems_0_2
files.changelogHtml: Added module for books and spellbooks.
